page.title: 12Industry
page.content: Industry is concentrated along the valley of the river Rother.There has been open cast mining in the area for centuries for both coal and minerals. There has also been extensive quarrying in the area.There is a large industrial area in the southern section of the D block consisting of steel works and chemical works.The steel works once covered a very large area but in the last 15 years it has declined rapidly in importance and large sections are closed and derelict.Small businesses have taken over the office buildings.There is a brick works at Barrow Hill.There is a small industrial estate along the Staveley to Eckington road.The chemical works is an expanding industry.
